## Projects
- **Development of an Interactive Visualization and Training Toolkit for Climate Impacts on the Channel Islands National Marine Sanctuary**

  This project focused on developing an educational toolkit and an interactive, Python-based web application to visualize ecologically significant climate variables within Channel Islands and Southern California.

- **2024 MTA Open Data Challenge**

  New York's public tranportation data was used to create a data visualization on the rider's wait time for the bus. This was done for the New York's MTA open data challenge, during October 2024.
